native.query:
SELECT 
    solutions.programname AS "Program Name",
    projects.statename AS "State Name",
	projects.districtname AS "District Name",
    SUM(CASE WHEN projects.status = 'started' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Started",
    SUM(CASE WHEN projects.status = 'inProgress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "In-Progress",
	SUM(CASE WHEN projects.status = 'submitted' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Submitted",
    SUM(CASE WHEN projects.status = 'submitted' AND projects.evidence IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Submitted projects with evidences"
FROM projects 
JOIN solutions ON projects.solutionid = solutions.solutionid
WHERE 1=1
[[AND {{program_param}}]] 
[[AND {{state_param}}]]
[[AND {{district_param}}]]
GROUP BY solutions.programname, projects.statename, projects.districtname
ORDER BY "Submitted" DESC;
